name: Obside - The Game
description:
Searching for a secret on an unknown planet and after an unexpected encounter. You will quickly understand that to get away from here and discover who you are, you will have to manipulate everybody…

And you ? Will you preserve your free will ?

Obside is a 2nd year student game project. More precisely, it's a third-person action-adventure game with a strong emphasis on stealth mechanics.
You play a weak but reckless character that has the ability to mind manipulate entities around her and use them to her advantage in a systemic environment.

Our team is composed of 4 Game Designers :
- Quentin Milana (Game Design, Programing, Creative Direction)
- Deep Mande (Game Design, Level Design)
- Emmanuel Lataste (Game Design, Programming, Level Design)
- Clément Amendola (Game Design, Level Design, Sound Design)

And 2 Game Artists :
- Tanguy Talbert (3D modelling, Chara Art, lighting) and Artistic Direction
- Eliott Moret (3D modelling, tech, terrain)


You can follow the steps of developement for the Hitsplaytime student contest on our Devblog : https://medium.com/obside-devblog

You can reach the team on our social media channels for the game :
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ObsideGame/?modal=admin_todo_tour
Twitter - https://twitter.com/ObsideGame
